text: Arjun is a gateway to the blockchain
space more specifically to ethereum so
we have solved the core security and
usability issues of blockchain for users
by really moving security and logic the
protocol layers with Arjun you get the
same experience and what you are used to

in control of your assets and your
identity but you don't need to backup a
private key on paper you don't need to
worry about someone stealing your assets
the smart contract will protect them and
we abstract complex concept like
transaction fees or gas fees in the
theorem space
